programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining & fun for the first couple of seasons","reviewBody":"Grimm was entertaining and fun for the first couple of seasons, when it focused on the simple monster-of-the-week stories. Unfortunately too many story-lines about the powerful royal family of vessen, the reapers, the vessen-grimm politics, and the vessen-killing military cult got introduced. The show got ridiculous and annoying.

Nick's wife became a central figure, a lot of insanely off-the-rails things happened to her, and her character was a big drag on the show, in my humble opinion. Claire Coffey was another character that became a drag because she was sleeping with every main character and having kids with them and Grimm became a soap opera about sleeping around, pregnancy clinics, parenting training, and family dynamics.

The last couple of seasons were really hard to watch. Grimm became Dr. Phil's Monster Families."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,crime drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West","dateCreated":"2021-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining & fun for the first couple of seasons","reviewBody":"Grimm was entertaining and fun for the first couple of seasons, when it focused on the simple monster-of-the-week stories. Unfortunately too many story-lines about the powerful royal family of vessen, the reapers, the vessen-grimm politics, and the vessen-killing military cult got introduced. The show got ridiculous and annoying.

Nick's wife became a central figure, a lot of insanely off-the-rails things happened to her, and her character was a big drag on the show, in my humble opinion. Claire Coffey was another character that became a drag because she was sleeping with every main character and having kids with them and Grimm became a soap opera about sleeping around, pregnancy clinics, parenting training, and family dynamics.

The last couple of seasons were really hard to watch. Grimm became Dr. Phil's Monster Families.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,crime drama","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West","dateCreated":"2021-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining & fun for the first couple of seasons","reviewBody":"Grimm was entertaining and fun for the first couple of seasons, when it focused on the simple monster-of-the-week stories. Unfortunately too many story-lines about the powerful royal family of vessen, the reapers, the vessen-grimm politics, and the vessen-killing military cult got introduced. The show got ridiculous and annoying.

Nick's wife became a central figure, a lot of insanely off-the-rails things happened to her, and her character was a big drag on the show, in my humble opinion. Claire Coffey was another character that became a drag because she was sleeping with every main character and having kids with them and Grimm became a soap opera about sleeping around, pregnancy clinics, parenting training, and family dynamics.

The last couple of seasons were really hard to watch. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West","dateCreated":"2021-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining & fun for the first couple of seasons","reviewBody":"Grimm was entertaining and fun for the first couple of seasons, when it focused on the simple monster-of-the-week stories. Unfortunately too many story-lines about the powerful royal family of vessen, the reapers, the vessen-grimm politics, and the vessen-killing military cult got introduced. The show got ridiculous and annoying.

Nick's wife became a central figure, a lot of insanely off-the-rails things happened to her, and her character was a big drag on the show, in my humble opinion. Claire Coffey was another character that became a drag because she was sleeping with every main character and having kids with them and Grimm became a soap opera about sleeping around, pregnancy clinics, parenting training, and family dynamics.

The last couple of seasons were really hard to watch. Grimm became Dr. Phil's Monster Families.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,crime drama","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Marzeniem studenta Dimy jest drogi zagraniczny samochód. Jest więc rozczarowany, gdy dostaje od ojca czarną wołgę. Okazuje się, że auto ma magiczne właściwości i potrafi latać. Niestety, maszynę próbują zdobyć mafiosi.

programme.title: Passengers
Ocaleni
Passengers
programme.desc: Passengers: Directed by Rodrigo García. With Anne Hathaway, Patrick Wilson, Andre Braugher, Dianne Wiest. A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0449487/","name":"Passengers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3ODE5MjIzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4Nzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0449487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christine_devries"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting, thought-provoking movie...","reviewBody":"I liked this movie. I like the whole, 'elemental humanity' that you find in it. It is possible to identify with the characters and the universality of the movie. It really is a bit of a psychological thriller which I like. The only thing is that, after watching it, you may get a little depressed. The ending is completely unexpected, I must say. It made the movie completely worth it, when at times it would just get really confusing out of no where. I definitely thought it was worth seeing. I love movies that invoke an emotional response. The twists and turns will keep you guessing and you may get more out of it than you expected. Happy watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36214,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-09-26","keywords":"airplane crash,survivor,explosion,afterlife,doctor patient relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Passengers: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3525836825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5NDQ0Njk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5NDQ0Njk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first theatrical trailer for Passengers, directed by Rodrigo GarcÃ­a."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001556/","name":"David Morse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006554/","name":"Rodrigo García"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123049/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159892/","name":"Ronnie Christensen"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: SYFY Inside: Krypton - Die besten der Bösen
Der Hobbit - Eine unerwartete Reise
programme.desc: Als der Geschäftsführer Blake Creighton (Michael Therriault) eines Morgens tot in seiner Wohnung aufgefunden wird, wird der Fall an Detective Jules Dover (Lisa Marcos) und ihre Partnerin, die virtuelle Intelligenz Asha (Harveen Sandhu), übergeben. Die ersten Befunde zeigen eindeutig, dass die Todesursache Strangulation gewesen sein muss. Doch Detective Dover und Asha finden keinerlei Hinweise auf Einwirkung von außen. Es scheint, als wäre Creighton ermordet worden, ohne vom Täter auch nur berührt worden zu sein. Syfy zeigt alle 10 Episoden von Halcyon in der Spielfilmfassung.

programme.title: Wyjscie awaryjne
Wyjście awaryjne
programme.desc: Wyjscie awaryjne: Directed by Roman Zaluski. With Bozena Dykiel, Jerzy Michotek, Maria Gladkowska, Andrzej Golejewski. When her daughter unexpectedly gets pregnant, authoritative mother Jadwiga, who is a local government official, starts looking for a fictional husband. To make matters worse, she only finds a guy with a criminal record." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084923/","name":"Wyjscie awaryjne","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ5MjY3OTY3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk3MDA0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When her daughter unexpectedly gets pregnant, authoritative mother Jadwiga, who is a local government official, starts looking for a fictional husband. To make matters worse, she only finds a guy with a criminal record.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084923/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Witold"},"dateCreated":"2007-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"things are not always what they seem","reviewBody":"The earlier commentator defined the essence of the plot: Dorota is pregnant; her parents Wladek and Jadwiga decide to buy her a husband for a quick marriage and a quick divorce as a cover up for the baby on the way. When it turns out that the young man Bronek who accepted the task has a criminal record, things look bleak and anything but comical. The first signal that this impression is not the whole story comes from a short conversation between Wladek and Bronek. Wladek says "We are not going to pay you for repairing the TV antenna on the roof, we did not ask you to do this work, you will not get one cent more". Bronek's reply is astonishing: "No problem. I never had a home". In addition to the main story interesting events unfold in the background. The local priest practices medicine, there is often a line of patients in front of his home - seen from the street. Jadwiga as the mayor considers this view a disgrace to her small town. She is powerless, however; the priest takes no money from his patients. The local police chief has amorous designs on Jadwiga. By an accident the criminal past of Bronek is revealed to a third party and blackmail begins. There is also a real criminal lurking in the dark - and a visit of an important dignitary from Wroclaw is a threat to the locals also. As befitting a comedy, various problems get solved eventually - but after delightful twists and turns.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":453,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1982-12-26","keywords":"deception,unwanted pregnancy,small town,provincial life,morality","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0245859/","name":"Bozena Dykiel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0585259/","name":"Jerzy Michotek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321601/","name":"Maria Gladkowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952480/","name":"Roman Zaluski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611650/","name":"Andrzej Mularczyk"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Poszukiwany, poszukiwana
Poszukiwany, poszukiwana
programme.desc:
Poszukiwany, poszukiwana: Directed by Stanislaw Bareja. With Wojciech Pokora, Jolanta Bohdal, Mieczyslaw Czechowicz, Maria Chwalibóg. Falsely accused Warsaw art museum assistant goes into hiding as a woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0070557/","name":"Poszukiwany, poszukiwana","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThiNDhmMmMtZGVkYS00ZWE3LWIyZjgtMWFhYjIxNjhiN2FhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Falsely accused Warsaw art museum assistant goes into hiding as a woman.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0070557/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wodorost"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cross-dressing butler in communist Poland of 1973","reviewBody":"I saw this film then and i saw it yesterday and it is as funny as it was. This is very rare when it comes to the Polish comedies that was made at that time. Often they where so overloaded with symbols and metaphors placed there for the sake of the censorship that they were no more funny for someone who does not lived there.

This is a story of a thirty-something man and his struggle with a piece of paint he was responsible for at the art museum where he worked. The paint was accidentally taken and he was made responsible for the disappearance. He will be sentenced for some years jail, but manages to escape the police. He begins a voyage as a servant maid in the communist capital city of Warsaw. He also tries to recreate the painting by himself so he can return to his native work.

After all he figures out that he is much more better paid as a servant in Poland than an academic researcher he used to be...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2105,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1973-04-22","keywords":"comedy of errors,comedy of manners,political satire,social satire,art historian","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688684/","name":"Wojciech Pokora"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092007/","name":"Jolanta Bohdal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194387/","name":"Mieczyslaw Czechowicz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054402/","name":"Stanislaw Bareja"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054402/","name":"Stanislaw Bareja"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270204/","name":"Jacek Fedorowicz"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kogel-mogel
Kogel-mogel
programme.desc:
Kogel-mogel: Directed by Roman Zaluski. With Grazyna Blecka-Kolska, Ewa Kasprzyk, Zdzislaw Wardejn, Katarzyna Laniewska. A country girl Kasia Solska is forced by her family to marry the man she finds unattractive. She secretly gets to university, escapes from her village to Warsaw and starts working as a babysitter there." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097676/","name":"Kogel-mogel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzllYjNlMjktYWI3My00ODVhLWE5ZTktZWU1ZDllYWYzMzFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A country girl Kasia Solska is forced by her family to marry the man she finds unattractive. She secretly gets to university, escapes from her village to Warsaw and starts working as a babysitter there.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097676/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Petelecaster"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"An entertaining watch, typical of 1980s Polish comedy","reviewBody":"A very typical rendition of Polish comedy in the 80s, though not the funniest I've seen.

The plot follows a series of "coincidental" events largely forced by the indivdual interests of a few, who in the end get what they want at the expense of Kasia's freedom and education. While the film delicately touches on female objectification, it appears to do so sparingly and innocently, translating into a successfully executed plot guaranteed to pull out unexpected laughter and entertainment throughout.

programme.title: Galimatias, czyli kogel-mogel 2
programme.desc: Kontynuacja losów lubianych przez widzów bohaterów "Kogla-mogla". Za kamerą ponownie stanął Roman Załuski, twórca takich hitów jak "Och, Karol" czy "Komedia małżeńska". Po ślubie Kasia i Paweł zamieszkują na wsi. Ojciec dziewczyny obiecuje, że przepisze na nich ziemię, jeśli zostanie dziadkiem. Pawłowi zależy na przejęciu gospodarstwa, lecz Kasia marzy o powrocie na studia. W jej życiu znowu pojawia się docent Wolański ze swoją rodziną.
